name: Segmentify
slogan: Most Intelligent Personalization Platform for eCommerce
description: Segmentify is a SaaS tool and helps e-commerce managers convert visitors to customers by making smart recommendations. Conversion optimisation is the main problem of e-commerce websites where an average of only 1% of their visitors are converted (makes purchases). All the ads, SEO, re-marketing and re-targeting efforts/costs made for 100 visitors are expected to be covered by the purchase of single customer. Segmentify provides on-site marketing tools by recommending the right product to right visitor at the right time resulting in higher conversion rates. Segmentify's ready to use Product Recommendation Campaigns could be enabled by a single on/off button. Segmentify provides two analytics modules to e-commerce managers and enable them to perform Predictive Analytics by measuring, tracking and monitoring performance of their products with Trendify and banners with Bannerify in real time through the whole conversion funnel and take relevant actions on their visitors at any point.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative - UK
jobs.description:
“Segmentify” is an e-commerce personalization platform that helps online retailers to optimize their conversion rates by enabling them to deliver a unique shopping experience for each visitor. Segmentify tracks each individual visitor’s behavior in real-time and makes them smart product recommendations by using in-house developed AI technology.

We have a dynamic and passionate compact team dedicated to create a SaaS solution to create a better and personalized web experience to visitors and customers. We are selected as one of the 25 Machine Learning Startups to Watch In 2018 by Forbes magazine. We are one of the fastest growing start-up in AI based e-commerce solutions with multiple investment rounds and 5 offices in globe.

As a Sales Development Representative, you will be required to nurture new and existing relationships within UK & Ireland territory. Targeting, engaging, qualifying and scheduling meetings with prospects whilst working closely with internal teams to deliver on set objectives, targets and quotas. We are offering a competitive salary plus uncapped commission to join our growing central London based team.

What you will do:
* Call, email, and use LinkedIn to engage prospects who might be a fit for the Segmentify platform
* Schedule and hold Discovery meetings with your Account Executive and key decision-makers
* Develop an understanding of both Segmentify (i.e. products, services, partners, and value proposition) and of the key attributes of our best Merchants to prospect and qualify leads through outbound sales activities
* Develop and maintain accurate forecasts and effectively maintain a CRM with detailed and accurate notes of all sales-related activities 
* Attend marketing events

Requirements:
* 12+ months experience prospecting or selling SaaS solutions
* Understanding of SaaS and e-commerce technologies
* Sales or sales development experience, ideally in a high volume, fast-paced inside sales environment
* Working knowledge of sales methodologies and solution selling, including BANT
* Proactive, ambitious and commercially orientated
* Strong research and lead generation skills
* Meet, if not exceed, monthly targets and document activity within CRM

jobs.title: Partnership Manager - UK
jobs.description:
“Segmentify” is an e-commerce personalization platform that helps online retailers to optimize their conversion rates by enabling them to deliver a unique shopping experience for each visitor. Segmentify tracks each individual visitor’s behavior in real-time and makes them smart product recommendations by using in-house developed AI technology.

We have a dynamic and passionate compact team dedicated to create a SaaS solution to create a better and personalized web experience to visitors and customers. We are selected as one of the 25 Machine Learning Startups to Watch In 2018 by Forbes magazine. We are one of the fastest growing start-up in AI based e-commerce solutions with multiple investment rounds and 5 offices in globe.

ROLE

We are looking for a candidate to join within our London office as Partnership Manager. You will focus on developing our eCommerce agency partner network and driving business alongside our tech partners in the UK and Europe.

You will initially be expected to identify, qualify and recruit new eCommerce agency partners and develop those relationships whilst working with an established set of agency and technical partners. The main responsibility will be to identify new referral opportunities for the sales team and managing the pipeline of partner opportunities alongside the sales team. Your targets will be towards the generated opportunities/referrals for sales team with a combination of existing and new partners.

The ideal candidate for this role should have a minimum of 3 years’ experience in partnerships or business development with a SaaS sales background (e.g. Personalisation Solutions, eCommerce Platforms, Email Service Providers and CRM, etc.) with strong communication skills.

WHAT YOU WILL DO:

* Recruit, onboard and enable new eCommerce agency partners to drive new referral sales opportunities.
* Enhance the existing relationships with existing agency partners to improve the quantity and quality of referral sales opportunities.
* Keep track of the engagement with existing Technical Partners and help our technical team to keep interoperability between the products
* Seek for joint co-marketing opportunities with Technical and Agency Partners and facilitate the marketing team to realise them
* Achieve assigned opportunity targets with business driven through your assigned partner accounts.
* Monitor Partner expectations and support company management to meet them by inclusion of different teams in the organisation
* Help Partners to follow the processes in parallel to our Partner engagements
* Employ our CRM for partner and pipeline management.
* Attend eCommerce events through UK to represent the company for improving partner presence

REQUIREMENTS:

* At least 3 years’ experience in partner management on a national and/or regional scale in eCommerce domain with agency partners
* Proven track record on the ability to meet and exceed opportunity targets
* Proactive, ambitious and commercially orientated
* Strong verbal and written communication & presentation skills
* Experience with eCommerce platforms such as BigCommerce, Magento, Shopify, Shopware or Salesforce Commerce Cloud is a bonus

jobs.title: Senior Sales Executive - UK
jobs.description:
“Segmentify” is the leading AI driven Personalisation Platform for the Ecommerce industry. We help online retailers to optimize conversion rates by allowing the delivery of a unique shopping experience for each visitor, in real time. Having been listed by Forbes as one of the top Machine learning start-ups, we are now working with clients in over 15 countries and have an opportunity to join our growing central London based team.


Role

We are looking for a candidate to join within our London office as Senior Sales Executive. The ideal candidate should have the experience to recognise buying signals and to convert prospects with a proactive approach. Negotiating and closing skills will be highly required to deliver the results within the specified targets.

The candidate for this role should have a minimum of 3 years’ experience in sales with a SaaS sales background (e.g. Personalisation Solutions, eCommerce Platforms, Email Service Providers and CRM, etc.) with strong communication skills.

Besides a competitive salary, we are offering an uncapped commission for over-performing your sales quota.


What you will do:

* Develop and maintain strong knowledge of Segmentify (i.e. products, services, partners, and value proposition) and our Strategic Technology Partners
* Call, email, and use LinkedIn/Cognism to source and engage prospects who match the key attributes of our target merchant base. Research prospects and identify key stakeholders to generate interest
* Work closely with internal teams, SDR/Marketing/Customer Success, to deliver an exceptional customer on-boarding experience
* Develop and maintain accurate forecasts and effectively maintain a CRM with detailed and accurate notes of all sales-related activities
* Support with key marketing and networking events with the Segmentify team


Requirements
* 3+ years of experience selling SaaS solutions (Email Service Providers, MarTech, AdTech SaaS vendors, related eCommerce platforms) to mid-size and enterprise organisations
* Passionate about technology solutions, advantageous to have eCommerce technology experience
* Sales or sales development experience, ideally in a high volume, fast-paced inside sales environment
* Proven success in a target-driven new business sales role – meeting and exceeding sales quota
* Proactive, ambitious and commercially orientated approach
* Strong verbal and written communication & presentation skills
